extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected NetScaler Version
extracted_playbook.description: Determine if the NetScaler ADC or NetScaler Gateway version is affected by checking the installed version against the vulnerable versions listed.

extracted_playbook.title: Update to Latest NetScaler Version
extracted_playbook.description: Install the latest updated version of NetScaler ADC or NetScaler Gateway to mitigate the vulnerabilities.

cve_id: NetScaler ADC and NetScaler Gateway Vulnerabilities
affected_products: NetScaler ADC and NetScaler Gateway 13.1 before 13.1-49.13
NetScaler ADC and NetScaler Gateway 13.0 before 13.0-91.13
